relatedRecords.name: PHP UK 2020
relatedRecords.description: We are pleased to present the 14th Annual PHP UK Conference. An optional workshop day followed by two days of amazing talks, plentiful networking opportunities and great socials. PHP UK offers the most up-to-date PHP information and training.
